item.title: 最高法院征求美国对 10 亿美元音乐版权案的意见
item.description: 美国最高法院就音乐产业与互联网供应商考克斯通信公司（Cox Communications Inc.【原文：The US Supreme Court sought the federal government’s views in a billion-dollar copyright clash between the music industry and internet provider Cox Communications Inc.】

item.title: 联合利华印度公司将把冰淇淋业务分拆上市
item.description: 联合利华印度分公司将把冰淇淋业务分拆成一家上市公司，以充分释放其潜力，这也是全球冰淇淋业务调整的一部分。【原文：Unilever’s India unit will spin off its ice cream business into a listed firm to unlock its full potential, as a part of a global shakeup in the segment.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡咖啡价格创 1997 年以来新高，消费者面临咖啡价格上涨问题
item.description: 纽约的咖啡期货攀升至 1997 年以来的最高点，原因是人们对主要种植国的农作物感到担忧，这有可能进一步提高烘焙商和消费者的成本。【原文：Coffee futures in New York climbed to the highest since 1997 on worries about crops in top growers, threatening to further raise costs for roasters and consumers.】

item.title: 风暴减弱，法国核电产量跃升至 2015 年新高
item.description: 随着强风暴阵风的缓解，法国核能发电量攀升至 2015 年以来的最高水平。【原文：French nuclear generation climbed to the highest for this time of year since 2015 as intense storm gusts ease.】

item.title: 战争加剧通胀，经济放缓，以色列维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列中央银行在权衡与战争有关的经济放缓和通胀加快的情况下，维持利率不变。【原文：Israel’s central bank left interest rates unchanged as it weighs a war-related economic slowdown and quickening inflation.】

item.title: ID.me 完成要约收购，估值 18 亿美元
item.description: 一位熟悉情况的人士说，在线验证公司 ID.me 完成了一项要约收购，该公司的估值为 18 亿美元，比两年前的 17.3 亿美元估值有所提高。【原文：Online verification company ID.me closed a tender offer that valued the business at $1.8 billion, a step up over its $1.73 billion valuation two years ago, a person familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 反勒索软件初创公司 Halcyon 在新一轮融资中估值 10 亿美元
item.description: 网络安全初创公司 Halcyon Tech Inc. 是该行业最新的独角兽企业，其估值已达 10 亿美元，并达成了一项融资 1 亿美元的交易，该公司的目标是打击日益猖獗的勒索软件攻击。【原文：Cybersecurity startup Halcyon Tech Inc. is the industry’s latest unicorn, reaching $1 billion valuation in a deal to raise $100 million as it aims to combat the rise of ransomware attacks.】

item.title: 埃及搜寻红海旅游船沉没后的 17 名失踪者
item.description: 一艘旅游船在埃及红海沿岸沉没，埃及当局正在搜寻 17 名失踪者。【原文：Egyptian authorities are searching for 17 people missing after a tourist boat sank off the country’s Red Sea coast.】

item.title: 下届气候峰会将面临石油与亚马逊河之间的角力
item.description:
活动人士抱怨说，前三届缔约方大会都依赖石油和天然气。南美洲最大的石油生产国将主办2025年会议。【原文：

Activists complain that the last three COP hosts were oil-and-gas dependent. South America’s biggest producer hosts the 2025 session.

】

item.title: 匈牙利计划到 2027 年将最低工资提高 40% 以应对通胀风险
item.description: 匈牙利宣布将在三年内把最低工资提高 40%，总理维克托-欧尔班希望此举能提振受经济衰退影响的经济，但批评人士认为此举可能会助长通货膨胀。【原文：Hungary announced it will raise the minimum wage by 40% over three years in a move Prime Minister Viktor Orban expects to boost the recession-hit economy, but which critics say may fuel inflation.】

item.title: What Missiles Are Russia and Ukraine Firing? What Do They Do?
item.description: 俄罗斯对乌克兰的战争既受空中事件的影响，也受前线领土得失的左右。【原文：Russia’s war on Ukraine has been dictated as much by events in the air as by territorial gains on the front line.】

item.title: 华尔街 ETF 团队准备好在加密货币 "贬值 "时代大展拳脚
item.description: 随着对加密货币友好的总司令重返白宫，华尔街已准备好在这个价值 3.2 万亿美元的行业中推出新一代投机产品，以满足投资者的胃口；从机构新手到顽固的散户交易者。【原文：With a crypto-friendly commander-in-chief returning to the White House, Wall Street is ready to unleash a new generation of speculative products across the $3.2 trillion industry to sate investor appetite — from institutional newbies to die-hard retail traders.】

item.title: 刚果共和国计划改革，在现金短缺的情况下增加收入
item.description: 刚果共和国财政部长让-巴蒂斯特-翁达耶（Jean-Baptiste Ondaye）表示，刚果共和国将于明年开始实施旨在促进税收的改革，以帮助结束导致政府重组内债的现金短缺问题。【原文：The Republic of Congo will begin implementing reforms next year aimed at boosting revenue collection to help end a cash shortage that resulted in the government restructuring its domestic debt, Finance Minister Jean-Baptiste Ondaye said.】

item.title: 微策略公司再购 54 亿美元比特币
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. bought another $5.4 billion in Bitcoin, marking its third acquisition this month as the company rapidly increases its holdings.】

item.title: 英国扩大对俄罗斯石油舰队及其保险公司的制裁
item.description: 英国政府周一扩大了对俄罗斯能源产业的制裁，将数十艘负责运输该国石油的油轮以及两家参与石油贸易的保险公司列入黑名单。【原文：The UK government expanded its sanctions against Russia’s energy industry on Monday, blacklisting dozens of tankers responsible for moving the nation’s oil as well as two insurers involved in the trade.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动德克萨斯州西部荒野土地所有者股价上涨 230

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯提议在陷入困境的钢铁部门裁员 1.1 万人
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）的钢铁部门计划在本十年内裁撤或外包 11,000 个工作岗位，此举将缩减因全球钢铁供应过剩和能源价格上涨而损失数十亿欧元的业务。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG’s steel unit plans to eliminate or outsource 11,000 jobs this decade, a move that would shrink a business that’s lost billions of euros to a global steel glut and rising energy prices.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A more active market for first-time share sales will lead to a pickup in technology firms going public, according to a senior Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker.】

item.title: 英国监管机构坚持泰晤士河水务公司关键决策时间表
item.description: 英国监管机构将按照原定时间表对泰晤士水务公司的下一个大型商业计划做出重要决定，排除了进一步挤压这家陷入困境的公用事业公司财务的延迟可能性。【原文：UK regulators will stick to the original timetable for a key decision on Thames Water’s next big business plan, ruling out a delay that would further squeeze the finances of the troubled utility.】

item.title: 与会代表称欧佩克+将 12 月 1 日石油政策会议移至网上举行
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+计划在本周末举行在线会议，而非最初计划的面对面会议。【原文：OPEC+ plans to hold this weekend’s meeting online rather than in-person as originally indicated, delegates said.】

item.title: 阿根廷 YPF 公司将与竞争对手的合资企业合并液化天然气项目
item.description: 阿根廷国营能源公司 YPF SA 总裁 Horacio Daniel Marin 在 LinkedIn 上表示，该公司将加入竞争对手页岩钻探商泛美能源集团（Pan American Energy Group SL）和液化天然气运输商 Golar LNG Ltd. 正在开发的一家合资企业。【原文：Argentina’s state-run energy company YPF SA will join a venture being developed by rival shale driller Pan American Energy Group SL and liquefied natural gas shipper Golar LNG Ltd., YPF President Horacio Daniel Marin said on LinkedIn.】

item.title: 欧盟认为与中国达成避免征收电动汽车关税的协议进展甚微
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，最近几周，欧盟与中国就一项全面协议取代电动汽车关税的谈判只取得了有限的进展。【原文：The European Union has only seen limited progress in recent weeks in negotiations with China over a comprehensive deal to replace tariffs on electric vehicles, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 与 EQT 成立 35 亿美元天然气管道合资企业
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 管理的基金同意投资 35 亿美元与 EQT Corp. 成立一家合资企业，使这家美国天然气生产商能够减少债务。【原文：Funds managed by Blackstone Inc. agreed to invest $3.5 billion to create a joint venture with EQT Corp., enabling the US natural gas producer to reduce its debt.】

item.title: 物价回落，巴西分析师再次上调 2025 年利率预测
item.description: 由于担心公共开支和强劲的经济将使通胀率高于目标，巴西分析师连续第二周上调了 2025 年年末利率预测。【原文：Brazil analysts raised their 2025 year-end interest rate forecasts for the second straight week on fears that public spending and a strong economy will keep inflation above target.】

item.title: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉公司将以 34 亿加元的交易价格将 CI Financial 私有化
item.description: 加拿大共同基金管理公司 CI Financial Corp. 计划在阿布扎比穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）的支持下，以约 47 亿加元（34 亿美元）的价格进行私有化。【原文：Canadian mutual fund manager CI Financial Corp. plans to go private for about C$4.7 billion ($3.4 billion) in a deal backed by Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Capital.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 支持的英迪拉试管婴儿公司将在孟买 IPO（首次公开募股），筹资 4 亿美元
item.description: EQT AB is considering an initial public offering for Indira IVF that could raise about $400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: 阿达尼的法律纠纷可能因投资者诉讼风险而加剧
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）是亚洲数一数二的亿万富翁，他被卷入了一起涉嫌贿赂的阴谋，并面临着从美国到印度的法律诉讼风暴，律师们说，其中最紧迫的可能是投资者的诉讼堆积如山。【原文：Gautam Adani, one of Asia’s top billionaires, is embroiled in an alleged bribery conspiracy and faces a firestorm of legal action from US to India, the most urgent of which could be a piling up of investor lawsuits, say lawyers.】

item.title: 谷歌出售 Chrome 浏览器可能颠覆浏览器市场

item.description:
